name: Project.99_1702
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 3 games about ZXCVBN.

[RP6] by Sun Park

Survive in a tiny 6-button-dungeon.

[AudioVisualToy] by Jooeun Hwang

Make your own audio visual. Find secret achievements.

[Bear Rescue] by Jaewon Yoo

Rescue space bears by time control.
